name: 10 Seconds, 9 Lives
description:
Welcome to 10 Seconds, 9 Lives!

A tough-as-nails survival gauntlet where you must avoid a series of hazards lasting 10 seconds each. As a cat, you only have 9 lives and must avoid death for as long as possible to reach a new high-score.

Controls: MovementLeft and Right ArrowsJumpUp ArrowToggle ClockC

Gameplay is inspired by Obey the Game. 

Submitted for the Ludum Dare 51 game jam with the theme ‘Every 10 Seconds'

Credits: Joe Bevis (Programming)
Avneet Sekhon (Programming)
Malachi Kiloh-Munns (Programming)
Chloe Tong (Art)
Courteney Murphy (Art)
Danny Scott (Art)
Aine Keohane (Art)
